OrgName.entry: UNIVERSITY OF SHEFFIELD STUDENTS UNION INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS COMMITTEE (ISC)

Desc.entry: Represents the interests, welfare and issues of the international students and their dependents. Students from all 7 regions in the world organise events and activities that promote and celebrate international culture. Campaigns for issues affecting international students and holds annual events and awareness weeks, which include: Intro-fiesta, International Week, World Food Festival and an international cultural evening.

Address.entry: University of Sheffield Union of Students

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - GENERAL SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS
